properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 17 at 8:50PM HST until January 19 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu HI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Seas building to 8 to 10 feet.

* WHERE...Big Island Windward Waters.

* WHEN...From 6 AM HST Saturday through Sunday afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
A Small Craft Advisory means that wind speeds of 25 to 33 knots
and/or seas 10 feet or greater are expected to produce conditions
hazardous to small craft. Inexperienced mariners, especially
those operating smaller vessels, should avoid navigating in these
conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM SATURDAY TO 6 PM HST SUNDAY
